projects.title: Challenjeu
projects.content: Challenjeu is a social platform that lets you create and share challenges with others. Set and achieve your goals with the support of a community, follow each other's progress, and communicate to exchange ideas and stay motivated. Join Challenjeu today and start challenging yourself!
